labels.analysis: The MCP Server described as "Token Minter" is primarily focused on ERC-20 token management across multiple blockchains. It provides tools for deploying new tokens, querying token information, checking balances, transferring tokens, and retrieving transaction details. This functionality is centered around blockchain interactions, specifically for token creation and management.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Cryptocurrency & Blockchain" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around ERC-20 token operations across 21 blockchains, which falls squarely under blockchain ecosystem tools. The secondary label "Database Operations" is included because querying token information and transaction details involves database-like operations. The secondary label "API Integration" is chosen because these operations are likely exposed via API calls to blockchain nodes or services. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Token Minter
server_info_crawled.author: @kukapay/token-minter-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Mint ERC-20 tokens effortlessly across 21 blockchains. Deploy new tokens, check balances, and manage transactions with ease, all through an interactive interface. Simplify your token management and deployment process today!

tools.name: deployToken
tools.description: Deploy Server Token Minter Claim Server @kukapay/token-minter-mcp Try in Playground deployToken

tools.name: getTokenInfo
tools.description: Queries information about an existing ERC-20 token, including name, symbol, decimals, and total supply.

tools.name: getBalance
tools.description: Queries the native token balance (e.g., ETH or POL) of the current account on the specified chain.

tools.name: getTokenBalance
tools.description: Queries the balance of a specific ERC-20 token for the current account on the specified chain.

tools.name: transferToken
tools.description: Transfers a specified amount of ERC-20 tokens to a recipient address and waits for transaction confirmation.

tools.name: getTransactionInfo
tools.description: Retrieves details about a transaction, including sender, recipient, value, status, and deployed contract address if applicable.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@kukapay/token-minter-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: privateKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Ethereum private key for signing transactions
